_source.contentraw:
New York Democrats are bracing for stunning Election Day losses, and they already have a fall guy

Democratic officials and strategists in New York tell CNN they are bracing for what could be stunning losses in the governor‚Äôs race and in contests for as many as four US House seats largely in the suburbs.

With crime dominating the headlines and the airwaves, multiple Democrats watching these races closely are pointing to New York City Mayor Eric Adams, accusing him of overhyping the issue and playing into right-wing narratives in ways that may have helped set the party up for disaster on Tuesday.

‚ÄúHe was an essential validator in the city to make their attacks seem more legit and less partisan,‚Äù said one Democratic operative working on campaigns in New York, who asked not to be named so as not to compromise current clients.
https://www.cnn.com/2022/11/04/politics/eric-adams-new-york-crime-midterms/index.html

_source.content: WHICH IS TO BE MASTER?"When I use a word,‚Äù Humpty Dumpty said in rather a scornful tone, ‚Äúit means just what I choose it to mean ‚Äî neither more nor less.‚Äù‚ÄúThe question is,‚Äù said Alice, ‚Äúwhether you can make words mean so many different things.‚Äù‚ÄúThe question is,‚Äù said Humpty Dumpty, ‚Äúwhich is to be master ‚Äì ‚Äì that‚Äôs all.‚Äù - Excerpt from Alice in Wonderland, by Lewis Carroll, the pen name of Charles Lutwidge Dodgson.Words aren't immutable objects. They can change over time and frequently do so. However, when a group of elites sets out to specifically change language for the purpose of control, well, then one has Alice in Wonderland 1984-style.Words are the key to complex thoughts and, especially, the transmission of thoughts. Without personal mastery of words, freedom to spread ideas is hijacked and the controller of words becomes master.George Orwell, or Eric Arthur Blair as he really was, put it thus, "There is no swifter route to the corruption of thought than through the corruption of language."Virtually nobody has heard of Eric Arthur Blair or Charles Lutwidge Dodgson. We know what we know, whether or not we know it at all. When others control words for us we end up knowing only what they want us to know, which will never be much worth knowing.
_source.contentraw:
WHICH IS TO BE MASTER?

"When I use a word,‚Äù Humpty Dumpty said in rather a scornful tone, ‚Äúit means just what I choose it to mean ‚Äî neither more nor less.‚Äù

‚ÄúThe question is,‚Äù said Alice, ‚Äúwhether you can make words mean so many different things.‚Äù
‚ÄúThe question is,‚Äù said Humpty Dumpty, ‚Äúwhich is to be master ‚Äì ‚Äì that‚Äôs all.‚Äù - Excerpt from Alice in Wonderland, by Lewis Carroll, the pen name of Charles Lutwidge Dodgson.

Words aren't immutable objects. They can change over time and frequently do so. However, when a group of elites sets out to specifically change language for the purpose of control, well, then one has Alice in Wonderland 1984-style.

Words are the key to complex thoughts and, especially, the transmission of thoughts. Without personal mastery of words, freedom to spread ideas is hijacked and the controller of words becomes master.

George Orwell, or Eric Arthur Blair as he really was, put it thus, "There is no swifter route to the corruption of thought than through the corruption of language."

Virtually nobody has heard of Eric Arthur Blair or Charles Lutwidge Dodgson. We know what we know, whether or not we know it at all. When others control words for us we end up knowing only what they want us to know, which will never be much worth knowing.

_source.content: Pillow salesman and Trump ally Mike Lindell loses court bid to reclaim phone seized by FBI, access warrant detailsCNN ^ | 11/4/2022 | Katelyn Polantzhttps://www.msn.com/en-us/news/us/pillow-salesman-and-trump-ally-mike-lindell-loses-court-bid-to-reclaim-phone-seized-by-fbi-access-warrant-details/ar-AA13IEmaA federal judge in Minnesota has rejected Mike Lindell‚Äôs challenge to the FBI search and seizure of his phone in a 2020 election-related criminal probe.Judge Eric Tostrud said Lindell, CEO of My Pillow and a prominent backer of former President Donald Trump‚Äôs false voter fraud claims, had not shown that the search was unconstitutional, and said he could not have his phone returned or get more access to details from the search.‚ÄúThe Government has demonstrated a compelling interest in preventing the premature disclosure of search-warrant materials during its ongoing federal criminal investigation. Multiple factors here justify keeping the search warrant materials under seal,‚Äù the judge wrote.
_source.contentraw:
Pillow salesman and Trump ally Mike Lindell loses court bid to reclaim phone seized by FBI, access warrant details
CNN ^ | 11/4/2022 | Katelyn Polantz
https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/us/pillow-salesman-and-trump-ally-mike-lindell-loses-court-bid-to-reclaim-phone-seized-by-fbi-access-warrant-details/ar-AA13IEma

A federal judge in Minnesota has rejected Mike Lindell‚Äôs challenge to the FBI search and seizure of his phone in a 2020 election-related criminal probe.

Judge Eric Tostrud said Lindell, CEO of My Pillow and a prominent backer of former President Donald Trump‚Äôs false voter fraud claims, had not shown that the search was unconstitutional, and said he could not have his phone returned or get more access to details from the search.

‚ÄúThe Government has demonstrated a compelling interest in preventing the premature disclosure of search-warrant materials during its ongoing federal criminal investigation. Multiple factors here justify keeping the search warrant materials under seal,‚Äù the judge wrote.

Prager University is the world's leading conservative nonprofit that is focused on changing minds through the creative use of digital media. Taking full advantage of today's technology and social media, we educate millions of Americans and young people about the values that make America great. Donations to PragerU are tax-deductible.***Turning Point USA - Turning Point USA¬†is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization founded in 2012 by¬†Charlie Kirk. The organization‚Äôs mission is to identify, educate, train, and organize students to promote the principles of freedom, free markets, and limited government. Turning Point USA believes that every young person can be enlightened to true free market values.***Young America‚Äôs Foundation is committed to ensuring that increasing numbers of young Americans understand and are inspired by the ideas of individual freedom, a strong national defense, free enterprise, and traditional values.As the principal outreach organization of the Conservative Movement, the Foundation introduces thousands of American youth to these principles.¬†We accomplish our mission by providing essential conferences, seminars, educational materials, internships, and speakers to young people across the country.***Camus Reform - As a conservative watchdog to the nation‚Äôs higher education system, Campus Reform exposes liberal bias and abuse on the nation‚Äôs college campuses. Our team of professional journalists works alongside student activists and student journalists to report on the conduct and misconduct of campus administrators, faculty, and students. Campus Reform holds itself to rigorous journalism standards and strives to present each story with accuracy, objectivity, and public accountability.

group.description:
Prager University is the world's leading conservative nonprofit that is focused on changing minds through the creative use of digital media. Taking full advantage of today's technology and social media, we educate millions of Americans and young people about the values that make America great. Donations to PragerU are tax-deductible.***Turning Point USA - Turning Point USA¬†is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization founded in 2012 by¬†Charlie Kirk. The organization‚Äôs mission is to identify, educate, train, and organize students to promote the principles of freedom, free markets, and limited government. Turning Point USA believes that every young person can be enlightened to true free market values.***Young America‚Äôs Foundation is committed to ensuring that increasing numbers of young Americans understand and are inspired by the ideas of individual freedom, a strong national defense, free enterprise, and traditional values.As the principal outreach organization of the Conservative Movement, the Foundation introduces thousands of American youth to these principles.¬†We accomplish our mission by providing essential conferences, seminars, educational materials, internships, and speakers to young people across the country.***Camus Reform - As a conservative watchdog to the nation‚Äôs higher education system, Campus Reform exposes liberal bias and abuse on the nation‚Äôs college campuses. Our team of professional journalists works alongside student activists and student journalists to report on the conduct and misconduct of campus administrators, faculty, and students. Campus Reform holds itself to rigorous journalism standards and strives to present each story with accuracy, objectivity, and public accountability.


We could use a few extra moderators for this group. If you're interested in being a moderator for the group please contact: @help or support@gab.com

Between a bunch of militia wanna-bees running around, hanging out at polling boxes,  looking like silly little Halloween boys, to Kari Lake telling her fans; "so what if I have no experience in politics,  I want to rule the world!".  Arizona has always struck me as being a creepy place.  I had to stop in Gila Bend, AZ one time while traveling from LA to El Paso, and in the gas station was a sign that read;  our gas prices are cheaper because we will never give the feds one dime in tax money, and we do not accept credit cards!  The 4 guys at the counter looked like the hillbillies from the movie Delivance.  Creep show.  Hey!  Where do you want to live?  In the frigging desert where it gets to 130 degrees on a regular basis.  Cooks their brains.Speaking of Arizona;   A few years ago the Saudi's came to Arizona and bought up 3,000,000 acres of farm and ranch land to grow alfalfa and cattle.  Nobody said a word about it back in 2010 because it was right after the housing bubble burst in 2009, and those land owners thought they made a killing by selling their land for 5 times more than it was really worth.  But now?  In La Paz county,  AZ about 100 miles West of Phoenix where most of that Saudi owned land is,  all the wells are running dry.  And those very same Saudi land owners are taking water out of the Colorado River at alarming levels now.While the local politicians there in La Paz County  count the money the Arabs give them every month so they don't bitch.  And to add insult to injury,  all that beef and alfalfa they grow?  Goes straight back to Saudi Arabia via ships leaving out of  Long Beach,  CA.  None of it stays in the US.  First the Saudis had their guys fly planes into the twin towers in 2001,  then they rolled into Arizona and screwed everyone there. When will we learn?Oprah Winfrey has officially endorsed  John Fetterman in PA for US Senate.  Against the wishes of Dr. "Facelift"  Oz's campaign.  The bizarro thing about this is Oprah invented Dr. Oz.  If it wasn't for her, none of us would of ever heard his name, unless you were stupid enough to purchase some of his vitamin supplements.CNN is becoming hysterical now.  Chris Cizzilla and some others there claim the race for governor of New York might be going to the GOP!!!  Help Help!  Then we read the latest polling data from companies like 538 Polls which shows  Hochul with the same 9 pt lead she has had for over 2 months!   Hysteria silliness.  Even after John Fetterman gave a very bad debate performance,  voters in PA still love him anyway.  Dr. Oz according to only one Republican poll is ahead in PA.   Marist College polling companynm(rated A+ for accuracy),   who polls registered voters only,  just released their last polls before Tuesday, and they have Fetterman up by 6 pts.   3 other polling companies with only a 67% reliabilty rating say Dr. Oz is ahead by 2 pts.   And Chris Cizilla is hysterical now.Wow!üòé

_source.content: There are literally dozens of each, cults and false religions but if you‚Äôre born again (or ‚Äúborn from above‚Äù ‚Äì or ‚Äúborn anew‚Äù ‚Äì John 3:1-6 ‚Äì https://biblehub.com/greek/509.htm ), feel free to ignore every single one of them. The bottom line is they realistically have no idea what they‚Äôre talking about. A ‚Äúcult‚Äù is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù, but that‚Äôs another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about the finished work of Jesus or His Resurrection. There‚Äôs ALWAYS someone else as a ‚Äúleader‚Äù. Examples: Charles ‚ÄúTaze‚Äù Russell of Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER.An incorrect version of ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù exists in ANY cult which includes those ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù people. It‚Äôs totally impossible to ‚Äúearn a gift‚Äù. No ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù in false religions. One doesn‚Äôt HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Christianity doesn‚Äôt teach anything like either ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù or ‚Äúreligion‚Äù (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with The Lord). By contrast, salvation is ‚ÄúJust Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything‚Äù. (‚ÄúThe Gospel ONLY‚Äù, in other words ‚Äì Keyword: ‚ÄúONLY‚Äù). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We‚Äôre under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, He changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren‚Äôt robots. Forever‚Äôs a long time.Will cheerfully do what The Lord says instead. Feel free to take matters up with The Author if there‚Äôs some ‚Äúproblem‚Äù with how He writes His Own Book. That 1-on-1 with The Lord happens with 100% of everyone whether he or she ‚Äúbelieves that way or not‚Äù (see Hebrews 9:27-28). Confidence on the Day of Judgment is critical. Psalm 118:8 implies that it‚Äôs better to trust in The Lord than it is to put confidence in man.(SIDE NOTE - The term ‚ÄúChrist‚Äù is a title, not a name. It means either ‚ÄúThe Anointed One‚Äù or ‚ÄúMessiah‚Äù.)Rather than ask, ‚ÄúWhat would Jesus do?‚Äù Perhaps instead inquire as to what He may be doing in you. It‚Äôs more accurate and allowing Him to live in you is more feasible than merely trying to imitate behavior(s).In Hebrews 10:14, ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù means (may I have a drumroll, please) ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù. (That‚Äôs spiritually-speaking, or course. The rest of you? Welcome to being human.)(ANOTHER SIDE NOTE ‚Äì In some translations, ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù is worded as ‚ÄúForever‚Äù, ‚ÄúTo the end‚Äù or ‚ÄúFor eternity‚Äù.)COLOSSIANS 2:16-17 (CSB)Therefore let no one pass judgment on you in questions of food and drink, or with regard to a festival or a new moon or a Sabbath. These are a shadow of the things to come, but the substance belongs to Christ.HEBREWS 4:8-10 (CSB)For if Joshua had given them rest, God would not have spoken later about another day. Therefore, a Sabbath rest remains for God‚Äôs people. For the person who has entered his rest has rested from his own works, just as God did from his.https://www.biblegateway.com/
